dcterms:description: A dataset used to model the interaction between persons with dementia and robots, focusing on repetitive questioning and adaptive conversation strategies.

dcterms:description: Engagement levels and responses of individuals with Alzheimer's disease and related dementias (ADRD) to study the impact of social robots.

dcterms:description: A dataset detailing the behavioral-psychological symptoms of dementia (BPSD) and their associations with caregiver strategies.
